                                 com.itextpdf.text.DocumentException
        creates a pdf when the quantity is insufficient
        Parameters:
        cn - the name of the client
        pn - the name of the commanded product
        pq - the available quantity
        q - the commanded quantity
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the path is incorrect
